begin to powder your nose and come once again face to face with a foreign face...you
wonder if you've begun to gain some of Sharon's memories since you've seen her do
that same exact thing with her powder mirror...it seems impossible to you at first, but
then again, you've never swapped with anyone for more than a few hours, so maybe some
"side effets" kick in after more than a day...dreading the conscious and unconscious memories
Victoria may have picked up from your body, you decide not to push your advantage too
much and wait a little later to ask her about it.

You now have to get to your next class since the lunch break has gotten
to an end. You hurry to class and just before getting in, you come face to face with...
1242212211221221112212111112221222222111.title: Let her go on the date for now.

1242212211221221112212111112221222222111.content:
Before you can manage a foot into the room, a short adversary jumps in your path with a wide stance; clearly she wants your attention. "What's up?" You ask as you blink curiously a few times. "Hey." She says first, her small hand brushing at her cheerleader's skirt; an outfit she now wore in place of her mother's poor choice of school attire. "Hey." You respond back, rolling your head towards her as if to say "Can you get on with this?" Your unspoken comment amounts to the opposite of what you would assume as her lips pull at the edges as if risen by strings while her two hands cup by her chin as if to contain her excitement. "I found this really cool place Sharon, and I want you to come with me to it after school." She states.

Ignorance blanks your mind which results in you asking... "What is it?" A finger taps against her cheek as her body rocks back and forth while she emits a hum of thought. "It may look like just a shack but believe me, what's inside is pretty fuckin' amazing." She adds and as her eyes lapse onto your body, you realize what it is she is referring to. She has no idea who you really are so she is essentially luring 'Sharon' so she can swap bodies with her. You can't say you're surprised that Trisha would want to be Sharon, afterall, she is sort harassed by her at all times yet still remains good friends with her. She probably wants the shoe to be on the other foot.

It may distract you from the current hassle of trying to be Sharon and failing or even from the fact that the real Sharon is going on a date with the boy you pine for but it would also end up leaving you stuck as Trisha which may only be worse.
1242212211221221112212111112221222222111.title: Trisha.

choices: ...you strangely feel very happy : time to go to school !
...you hear the sound of your phone's ringing : someone's calling.
1242212211221221112212111112221222222111.content:
You decided that anything would be better than being stuck as Sharon and having to watch Victoria enjoy every minute in your body. You then decided to play dumb (which unsurprisingly, was easy enough to do in Sharon's body) and replied with a dismissive "Yeah, why not."
You then saw Trisha flash a huge smile, and say "Okay, we'll meet up later then ! I gotta go, boring english class coming up...Cya !" With English being your favorite subject as Victoria Wilson, you were slightly surprised to fing that you didn't care so much for the subject at the moment...but then again, it may just be more pressing matters.

You felt strangely relieved now that another swap was gonna take place, and decided to take the situation with a smile even tough you knew next to nothing about Trisha.
You also quickly realized that since the "body swap ladies" couldn't be at the shack tonight, you had to make a complex diversion for the swap to happen. You settled on Trisha's locker, which she had negligently let open when you parted, and wrote a little note that said :

If you want to be
Who you want to be
Write it down on this paper
And bring her tonight at 8PM.
You know the place. I won't be
here but i'll be watching.

You know who.

You slid it in the locker and carefully closed it afterwards before hurrying to physics class...


---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------

[A few hours later]

You were being bored out of your mind during maths class when you got a text from Trisha that said : Have an emergency, gotta go early. Meet me at 8PM. I'm sending you the adress. You smiled a mischevious smile and litterally waited for the class to end...

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------

[About 8PM, in a shack downtown]

You decided to keep the "naive, surprised girl" act for a while, and you made an effort to look freaked and uncertain as you met up with Trisha in the shack. "What are we supposed to see here exactly Trisha?" The girl, litterally beaming with what you guessed was anticipation, looked around her, then at her watch.
You decided to act quickly, since the act was just a way for you to make a smooth transition to her body, and maybe gather a little bit about her if you could...
You take a few steps backwards, and wish yourself swapped with Trisha Hillsburry. You feel faint for a second, feeling a little different with this swap than with your previous ones, for reasons you don't really understand...but you have no time to think about it, as you quickly pass out, your last vision being Trisha's body passed out just in front of you.

You come to your senses and instinctively look around you, Sharon's body confirming the fact that you are now, for all intends and purposes, Trisha Hillsburry. You quickly took a look at Trisha's cellphone to confirm you had been unconscious a few minutes, which started to worry you. You quickly chased the thought away when you saw Sharon's body coming to life slowly, before looking around her and seeing...her former self. Despite expecting this, she obviously looking surprised before pulling up a powder mirror from your former purse and looking at her new self, still dumbfounded, but clearly very happy with this turn of events. She came to you after a few seconds, clearly looking concerned about her friend despite having "tricked" her (or so she believed) into swapping bodies.

"Sharon, are you all right?" "Yeah...other than my head hurting a little...and the fact that I'm in your body !"

You did your best to look surprised and confused, and the new Sharon was too overjoyed to see it, since spilled the beans in a hurry. "Look...this will sound crazy but I've always envied you Sharon...you had it all : looks and guys, not to mention the cheerleading squad ! I came across this shack when...well, it's a long story, but somehow I asked someone to swap you and me, and it obviously worked."

You could tell she had trouble hiding a large grin, but she kept on :

"Now there's no way to undo it, so we might as well make the best of it. You're in a a good family, and even if my parents are a little crazy, they are okay people." You could tell she was overselling her life in hopes to ask you something, but you didn't object and answered. "So, I guess we'll have to get used to be each other, be called by the other's name and stuff? We are BFFs, but I'll need some info if we have to pull this off..." Now it was your turn to hide your grin, and after a couple more minutes, you quickly pulled off two sheets of paper you used to write down personal info about your respective lives. You then discovered how much info about Sharon's life you actually new...which was a lot. You weren't sure how much was coming from what the original Sharon gave you and how much of it you had "soaked in", but this surely was a worrying thing...

You exchanged the sheets to discover Trisha was sort of a "poor's man" Sharon : she was a little less pretty, which you already knew, her 32C breasts were no match for Sharon's 34D, and she had even worse grades than Sharon...the only positive in this was a possibility for you to start fresh, and especially away from the new Victoria. You saw she avoided Sharon at school today as much as she could, so you guessed this wouldn't be that much of a problem...and if it came to be, you'd deal with it later.

The new Sharon dropped you home in the convertible you came with, and you couldn't help but notice she nearly got you killed at least a dozen times on the road because she was litterally absorbed with her reflection. You actually looked at your new self a couple of times, and surprisingly found yourself more at ease being this dumb blonde girl than you were as Sharon. You got out of your reverie when Sharon, still awed, dropped you off at your new house and promised to have a long chat about the swap tomorrow at lunch. You absent-mindedly agreed to it, briefly saluted your parents before quickly fading to sleep.

When you wake up...
1242212211221221112212111112221222222111.title: You might as well.

1242212211221221112212111112221222222111.content:
"Good morning, Trisha." Is the opening statement of the girl, a sly sense of satisfaction potent in her voice as she mentions addresses you by her former name. You can tell she is grinning, perhaps renewed with the initial feeling all over again after awakening to her new body thinking it was all a dream. "Uh... hi." You respond hesitantly, a bit unsure of how you should treat her or if you even want to remain this way for another second. "I'm callin' to tell you that like you usually do, I'll pick you up for school this morning so be ready and shit." She informs you still with a sound as if her mouth is wide with an uncontrollable smile. "Alright." You reply with bluntly, perhaps not acting out the way Sharon would react to such a thing very well but you have little to desire to do so at this point. The thought brings a small smirk to your new cheeks as you describe in your mind just how completely upset Sharon would be if she suddenly swapped bodies with Trisha-- before she knew it was you doing it at least. "Ah... she would be so upset!" You chime with a small chuckle.

"What?" Asks Trisha. "Huh? Oh, nothing. I'll see you later then." You tell her, though as you hang up the phone the weight of what you've done begins to set in. Not only did you willingly swap with Trisha, you put her in the perfect shoes for figuring out that it's you who has the ability to swap bodies. If Sharon or Betty talk to her about the swap at all, she's definitely going to suspect something. You were hoping to get away from the hassle of being Sharon and swapping lives with her more or less unwillingly; a stress free day was all you wanted but as you sit down in front of Trisha's small mirror and cringe at your current image, you cannot even begin to fathom how you thought this would fulfill your need.

"What is up with her face?" You ask as you paw at the cheeks that are regrettably your own now. "It looks like I'm scowling but I'm not even trying. No wonder Trisha always looks bitchy and moody-- her neutral expression looks like she's pissed!" You exclaim as you push at the tips of your brows in hopes to raise them from their stern stance but as your hands rub against your hair, you find new problems. "I know I just woke up and probably need a shower but her hair feels so... gross." You whine as you ravage it with risen lip of disgust. "What was I thinking...? I know it's superficial and all but this is like a downgrade from my original body. The inside matters and what not but my insides aren't changing here. I-- I should swap back right now. This could only end badly." You conclude with only a subtle bit of hesitation pushing at the back of your decision.
1242212211221221112212111112221222222111.title: The new Sharon. (Trisha)

good (and somehow similar to the way she usually does it), you decide that now that the

The ride to school is slightly weird, as you've never witnessed someone taking on his/her new persona
like Trisha had "assimilated" Sharon. If you hadn't performed the swaps, you could have sworn you were
talking to the real Sharon. Her status as Sharon's BFF certainly had helped Trisha "rise to the occasion"
so to speak. She mostly talked about herself during the ride, while also taking subtle shots at your hair,
make-up or expression like you had seen Sharon do with Trisha a lot of times. You drifted through this
mostly because you were maily concerned about 2 things : how the new Sharon would interact with Betty
and Victoria, and how and when you were gonna swap back...

You were still in your reverie when you followed the new Sharon in the school hall, and waved her goodbye
to get to your first class. The last thing you saw before your maths teacher closed the door was "Victoria"
heading to talk to her...

Rummaging these thoughts in your mind, the bell quickly came and you exit the room to find...

1242212211221221112212111112221222222111.content:
...the new Sharon was waiting for you. And judging by the looks of it, she wanted to talk.

You suspected she would be pissed if she knew that you had been the one behind all the
swaps. After all, you had swapped her with your mother, even if you had corrected this
mistake a short time later. So you were kinda baffled with her first words...

"Time for a real talk.I know it's you in there, Victoria." You motioned for her to lower her voice
and dragged her a little further before answering. "How...how did you know ?"
With a satisfied smile, she clicked a finger to her head and added "Well...let's say "Victoria" had
something she wanted to discuss with me, and well, knowing the real her like I do, I figured it out
kinda quickly. Oh, and by the way...don't worry, i stayed in character, so she doesn't know we
swapped. As far as everyone is concerned but us, you're Trisha Hillsbury."

She looked far too satisfied to be done, and her final statement confirmed your fears...
"So it's kinda simple...either you leave the two of us like that, or I'm telling the truth. I've seen what it's
like to be really pretty and popular, so i'm never going back to this." She said, poiting at your current
body.

"As far as you're concerned, I don't really care. You can find another body for yourself as long as you don't
put a weirdo in my former body...Just leave me as Sharon and everything will be fine."

She finished her last sentence with a threatening smile and left for her next class, leaving you shocked and
confused, not knowing what to do next...

confront her about the swap. She talked you into staying swapped after you admitted she wanted your (Victoria's) body a lot more than you
did. Completely discouraged by this turn of events, you let yourself be "trapped" by Trisha into swapping with her, hoping only to escape the
daily confrontations with your former body.

but you also had been forced out of Sharon's much wealthier life and much hotter body.

( http://www.herbal-nutrition-solutions.co... )

notice how well the new "Sharon" and "Victoria" looked at ease with their new bodies. If you didn't know better, you could swear nothing had
changed since last week...You also noticed Betty looked really natural with "Victoria" which increased your stance on not telling her. You felt

You were on your way back home at the end of the day when you stopped by your locker and noticed a small note inside of it.

Oh, and one last thing : I totally forgot, but my parents want me to go to my cousin's birthday

"Dear Victoria (the real Victoria),

I know you want your body and life back. Being Trisha certainly cannot be ideal. If you are up to it, meet me after school today at the left end of the track field bleachers. You'll find out all you need to be yourself again then."

You were a bit confused by that. I can swap back any time I want, right? But when you thought about it, you realized how untrue that was. with Pauline Smith as Victoria. You had sometimes exchanged
stories, and knew she wasn't happy about her job and life right now,

She also always seemed to be smiling and friendly with students, so
the cold stare you received from her came as a total surprise.

"Miss Winterly, you need to follow me in the principal's office, there's
something he wants to talk to you about."

"What is it ?"

You tried to read her face, but judging by her seemingly frozen expression,
she didn't like Sharon. And you could only guess it was something serious,

"That is for the principal and you to discuss. I'll let your teacher know what is

You also noticed fuzzy memories started to appear in your mind about some
stuff Sharon had done : parties with Trisha and the jocks, becoming the head
cheerlader...so far, you didn't lose any of your memories as Victoria, which

The look on the Principal's face was obvious. Sharon was in a lot of trouble...
and now you were.

"Miss Winterly, please sit down. I guess you know why you're here..."

"I don..." As you were about to answer negatively, you felt a sharp pain to the
back of your head, and a flow of memories came back to you : even if it
primarily consisted of vivid images and feelings, you were able to quickly put
the pieces together and realize why, in fact, she deserved to be there.

First, and despite her parents' best efforts to get her to work harder, she seemed
disinterested in school duties (in a large part because she was obsessed why you,
which, added to the time she spent cheerleading and partying, left little to no time
to do her homework).
This had escalated for the past few months as her obsession why you grew (you had
flashes of her following you and actually referencing a lot of things you did) to the point
where she now was on the verge of failing her year.

This alone would worry the principal, but it seemed that on top if it all, her obsession had
caused her to behave incredibly erractically in school (and, from what you guessed, out of
school too). It had started with shows of disrespect towards her teachers which had caused
her numerous evenings in detention, but it had increased with mean-spirited pranks, the last
of which happening a few days ago and consisting of mocking publicly and with porn drawings
the poor taste in clothing of no other than Melissa Shank. One of the teachers had taken notice
and decided this was enough, which led to you being here.

Since you couldn't tell them why you really were innocent, you decided to stay quiet and just
nod while the principal reminded you of your various offenses, which he concluded by :

"That is why, Miss Winterly, we will notify your parents that considering your resume and your
grades and as of today, you are no longer a student here at Rosemont High."

"What ?!" You nearly fainted, feeling completely powerless.

"This shouldn't come as a surprise, you've had it coming for weeks, even months, and you never
once shown a sign of remorse or even willingness to fight for your grades...All you seem to care
about, according to your teachers, are cheerleading, parties and copying whatever Miss Wilson
is doing."

As he said that, you perceived that not only was he angry, but he seemed deeply worried, which
led you to believe he might say things to Sharon's parents that you don't want him to say.

"Please, Mister Thompson, you have to give me a chance !"

"You've had plenty of chances Miss Winterly, but it seems you blew them all."

"Please Sir ! I would do anything !"

He deeply sighed, and replied :

1242212211221221112212111112221222222111.content:
As soon as you saw her, you know you had to make a statement.

"Victoria. My locker. NOW."

This was how Sharon Winterly talked when she was furious with
someone and was about to take it out on that person. And that's how
you naturally did it when you saw Victoria.

The fact that you thought of herself as Victoria, maybe more than the
fact that you now had assimilated most of Sharon's mannerisms, were
disturbing.

But this was soon gonna be over. You just had to tell her she had gone too
far, swap back, and everything would be alright again.

You could tell Victoria knew she was in trouble when she saw you because
she looked preoccupied, but you also noted she wore a fading grin when she
realized you yelled at her the same way SHE would have...just a couple of days
earlier.

You quickly marched to Sharon's locker with Victoria. (hell, that's technically
who she was now, so considering her as such wasn't that bad, right ? Or was it...?)

You carefully tossed your hair back to its normal, parted state, and started clicking
your nails against the metal locker...AGAIN, two habits Sharon Winterly had...
but the thought of doing things differently seemed more foreign now than in the morning.
Strange...

You collected your thoughts well enough to scold Victoria anyway :

"- You got me expelled !"

Victoria's eyes widened briefly, and then she motioned you to tone it down, which you
reluctantly did,and added :

"-When were you gonna tell me you were in THAT much trouble ?"

She paused, and only added to your anger when she replied :

"-Well, technically you are, but..." You were going to explode, but she must have sensed it
since she quickly added :

"-Look, i can't do anything now ! How can you blame me for that ? It's not like I was actually
planning on swapping with you...so you can't really blame me for my past lifestyle...Plus
your parents are gonna solve the problem in a matter of minutes ! Trust me...I can't say much
more than that...Except that I've really liked our arrangement so far, and I would like a chance
to continue it."

She put a lot of emphasis in the word arrangement, clearly believing you settled for a long-time swap
when you capitulated the day before. Which, in a way, is what you did...But she sent you back to your
worries when she naively added :

"-And i'm sure you must be more at ease being me than you were yesterday ! I'm sure you felt it too...
like the habits and even memories are coming back to the bodies we currently inhabit. For example,
right now, do you remember how you got that scar ?"

She then showed you a little scar on her left forearm. You tried to remember how you got it as Victoria,
but you realized your mind was a complete blur when you tried to access memories of it...
You panicked, and it showed on your face since Victoria's smile widened when she answered :

"-I thought so ! I'm now almost completely Victoria Wilson !"

She was litteraly beaming with joy, like it was the best news she could have ever learned. And in a way,
it must have been. But it also confirmed the fact that your previous identity as Victoria Wilson was very
quickly slipping away from you.

Feeling an enormous amount of anger mounting, which you believed was the result of Sharon's personality,
you tried to control it and prevent yourself from throwing a temper tantrum (which was a typical Sharon
reaction when things didn't go her way), and in the end...

1242212211221221112212111112221222222111.content:
"Since you seem to copy Ms.Wilson, maybe you can attempt to copy her grades." He states which only leaves you blurting out a loud "Huh?" His eyes drift down towards the table where he begins to write upon a plain white index card. "Ms. Winterly, if you truly want to stay in this school, you will follow Ms. Wilson's tutoring with all of your gusto." He suggests but it only leaves you wide-eyed and bubbling mindlessly... "T--t-tu--tutor!? Her!?"

"Yes, Ms. Wilson is a marvelous student, you could learn a lot more than just study habits from her." He informs you-- sure you did fine in school but this praise which normally would be making you happy is only irritating you as you know it is no longer directed towards 'you.' "Pauline, please give this to Ms.Wilson to let her know about this arrangement." He says as he passes the card to her. She takes it with a soft smile before turning to leave, wincing a frown as her body revolves around in your direction as if she despises you or Sharon rather.

You sit in the chair, recalling everything that just transpired as if it were a dream but before you can garner an emotion about it, are shoved out from your daze. "That is all, Ms.Winterly." The principal says, whisking you away like a peasant. You walk back to your class, dazzled about what just happened. You have the ability to revert everything to normal whenever and yet hesitate to do so, instead taking the punishment of Sharon's past as your own. You shake your head violently back and forth, your pale brown hair clinging to your glossy lips. You pull it away and exhaust a long sigh... "I want to rip Sharon's head off." You mumble as you step back into class.

--

Thoughts about what you should be doing plague your mind throughout the day and as the final bell rings, you rush to confront the foul girl who has stolen your identity. You wait beside her bus home, tapping your foot at a furious pace. She walks up to you with a chipper smile. "Hey, Sharon." She says plainly. You stomp your foot down and press your face towards hers. "What is this crap about getting tutored!?" You exclaim but your upturned lip does little to stutter her as she calmly raises her hands. "It's to be expected. You've always been pretty careless about school. It's better than being expelled at least." She responds, so convincingly passing all of her past idiocies onto you like she had never once been in the shoes you're currently wearing. "Don't worry, with my tutoring, you'll be just fine. Come on, come home with me." She states as she pushes at your back, motioning you onto the bus. You don't decline and climb aboard the very familiar bus, the one you should still be going on daily.

"I can't believe I have to get 'tutored' by you." You pout with your arms and legs tightly folded with rage. She takes a seat beside you with a light chuckle and places a hand upon your shoulder. "It's not so bad and hopefully when all is said and done with you'll care about more than just cheerleading and partying." She says with a playful smile which only tenses the fibers of each and every muscle beneath your skin. "I will swap us back right this instant." You threaten with your lips only an inch from her ear and a finger pressed against her cheek. You doubt it did much to douse her ego but it did at the very least cease all conversation until after you walked back into your former home.

Up in your old room you sit forcefully down on the floor with your books spread out all around you. "You don't have to actually tutor me. I know all of this-- I'm not the one who really blew off her school." You tell her as you pick up one of the books from the floor and the worksheet entitled for it. "Fine..." She grumbles as she goes to work on her own homework. After several minutes of silent work, you see Sharon drop to the floor a completed worksheet but what's surprising is that it's the same one you're currently struggling with! You glance upon her answers from the twisted angle, finding them detailed and precise; clearly answered correctly. While here you are not even a third through the same sheet. Your looming stare at your paper and your obsessive batting of your pencil against it lead Sharon to peer over your shoulder and ask... "Want some help?"

You are about to decline her offer but before you can even tuck the paper away from her view, she leans over your shoulder even further, a finger pressing itself against the page at your currently unanswered question. "Oh, this one. You have to..." She begins to blabber on about how to solve it while slowly and confidently brushing her long blond bangs out of her view, all while wearing a dastardly proud smile. "Get it?" She finally asks, turning her soft smile towards you-- though it only looks cocky and smug to you. The situation finally gets to you, resulting in you blurting out... "How do you know this when I don't!? I felt it earlier too. This whole swap is messing with my head somehow too! I remember things about your life that I shouldn't! You're experiencing it too then!"

"You're crazy. I've always been smart, I just never tried. I--I don't know what you're talking about with all this memory swapping stuff." She responds as she rises to her feet. Her face drifts to it's profile as if to hide from you while her eyes drift even further from your direction. You suspect the worst and begin to really feel as though what you thought was just a feeling may be real. Perhaps you really are becoming more and more like Sharon with each second you remain this way!

"N--now if you don't mind I have to pick out what I'm going to wear later on my date." She says which only leaves you even more frightened about the future outcome. You may just be losing your mind but you decide to...

What am I thinking ? I am Sharon Winterly ! And what am I doing in this Wilson girl's
house ? She doesn't wan't to join the cheerleaders anyway...Wait, what ?!

It had gotten much worse : it now seemed like you had two split personnalities : one

or even worse, she could have gotten your power.

You muttered some random answer and thanked her for her time and left in a hurry. You drove your
convertible...

You figured the best way to get some answers would be to call Victoria Wilson. You realized how foreign this body and life now sounded to you,
when less than a week ago, it had been yours... Sighing heavily, and seemingly lost about what you truly want now, you hope this phone call will help
you clear your mind and maybe figure out what happened and where to go from here...

You dial your former number and realize it's even harder than it was a couple of hours ago to remember it, confirming your theory about losing more and
more of your identity and memories...thinking of Victoria as somebody else made you tense as she answered quite gleefully. "Hello Ellee...I knew you
were gonna call." Somehow, this answer sent a shiver through your spine, even though it was said with a joyous tone. You tried and fight back, and
asked is she knew what had happened." It's pretty simple really...I,Victoria Wilson, used my power." Although you were troubled by her revelation,
you decided to learn a bit more about what she claimed she did. "But why me...why swap your...cousin I believe ? with me..."

She made a pause, and cautiously added : " You seemed ill at ease as Sharon. We both passed out, and when i woke up I felt...changed. More than your
habits and memories, I knew I had gained something else. So I tried swapping and found out as Victoria, I had acquired your power. So the first thing I did
was swap you with someone I could both trust and who I knew wanted to be me. For some reason, Ellee had always wanted to be in my shoes despite being
a natural beauty herself. So now, and unless I decide otherwise, you're now Ellee and she's now Sharon. Now go bother someone else, I have to go to school."

And just like that, she hung up on you. Feeling completely powerless, you decided to...
1242212211221221112212111112221222222111.title: Call your former body.

1242212211221221112212111112221222222111.content:
You finally decide to stay as you are right now. Even she has a knack for driving you crazy, you realize she had some valid points: she never did try as Sharon,but she's now more willing to do so since the swap. Furthermore, you also have been extremely tense and sensitive since it happened, and you guessed it doesn't help your performance at school at all. Still, there are some odd circumstances that your would like explained, and Victoria's uneasiness when tackling the memory swap issue does nothing to reassure you in that regard. So you decided to press the issue a little more before going back home.

"Be completely honest with me, because your current state depends on it." You pointed a finger in her direction and greatly accentuated the word "state" in order to get her attention. Judging by her uncertain look, you quickly guessed you did well, and continued. "Have you or have you not felt some different things about your memories and skills since we swapped ?"
You watched her closely, knowing that the answer would come as much from her reaction than her words. As you might have expected, she shrugged her shoulders and added "Honestly? I don't know...Yes, I'm more focused at school and I'm doing better in my homework, but I'd say it comes from being finally relaxed and happy with my life, as opposed to always being partying, chatting away and generally unhappy before. And you can't tell me you haven't been distracted at school today !"

Then again, she had a point. Your schoolday had been rocky to say the least...between your difficulties coping with being Sharon, Trisha's "situation" and the principal, not mentioning the amount of people chatting with you during classes, you couldn't even follow a single class properly, which also made you understand why Sharon was struggling so much with her grades.Maybe you weren't becoming her, but adopting her daily routine sure hurt you in a lot of different ways...

"Listen, Victoria, we can't do that same stuff tomorrow. Things HAVE to change if you want this to work." You could see the new Victoria Wilson was having trouble containing her smile, cause she knew that right this moment she had won yet another battle in order to definitely secure this body and life.

She also successfully hid the fact that she indeed had been noticing a sublte change in her IQ, and that she had learned things about Victoria Wilson's life that no one but the one and only Victoria Wilson knew...Her dream would be for the power to come to her in the end, but all in all, the former Sharon would be pretty damn happy to definitely be in the driver's seat of this swap. Then she had an idea...It couldn't work, but the current Sharon was so desperate...She decided to try it. "You know, if you really want to be sure, you could always try to swap with someone completely foreign to you.I know there are a few girls at school who would be willing to try it just for the sake of being in this body." She said, poiting to the girl she was tutoring. "Like it or not, we are closer than you think, so I guess it's harder for you to be sure of any change. If you tried with Trisha, I'm pretty sure you could verify your "memory transfer" theory. And she'd kill to be in my former body, I can assure you of that."

Trisha was the dumbest of her friends : she only cared about looks, boys and cheerleading, and she envied Sharon just because she was better than her at all three. Now if she was able to swap those two, she would have enough time to definitely secure her position as Victoria...and who knows, maybe get the power !

Seeing the current Sharon Winterly hesitating, she tried another solution that seemed equally appealing to her :

"Or if you want someone outside of the cheerleading circle, you could always try swapping with Mika Lu." Mika was best friends with Robert's sister Maria. She was a running freak and a marathon specialist, but she had a flaw that could be exploited : the girl had absolutely no curves at all, and from the conversation the current Victoria had with her just today, she would do ANYTHING to be in a curvy body (and a killer hot one to boot). The girl was also prone to forgetting things and being dreamy, which could also play out well if they were to swap.

"What do you think ? You have a unique way of verifying your theory, you might as well try it !"

After thinking long and hard (or as long and as hard as she could as Sharon), the former Victoria weakly nodded. "You're probably right. Let's call ______ and do it right now."

1242212211221221112212111112221222222111.content:
"I'll pick Anita Moreno." You got your cellphone from your shiny purse, and dialed her number. She seemed to have picked up the phone in a hurry, which you believe is probably due to Sharon's "top of the food chain" social status.

"Hey Anita ! Sup girl ?" You asked, knowing Sharon was kinda friendly to the girl since she had plans to recruit her into the squad in the near future. Wait, how did I know that? I really have to figure out this memory stuff...
"Hola Sharon ! How are dju ?" Was her reply, though you struggled to understand some of it due to her thick mexican accent. Now her parents were some kind of top-notch engineers that moved from Mexico two years ago to earn top dollar in some sort of hi-tech firm, and even if her grammar was very good, Anita still had trouble losing her native accent. Wonder if I'll pick that up when we swap...

"I'm fine ! Actually i'd like to see you about the cheerleading squad ! I know you've helped us sometimes with our projects in the past, and I need your help once again. Could we meet at my house in about an hour ?" "Yes of course Sharon ! I'll see dju there !"

You hung up and turned back to face Victoria. "Then it's settled...I'd better go back to the house. I'll check in with you tomorrow, no matter what happens. Until then, don't do anything i wouldn't"

Victoria flashed you a warm, typical Victoria smile by answering "And don't do too much of the things I would ! Goodbye Sharon !"

You finished your homework assignment in a few minutes by copying over Victoria's sheet, and hurried back to the mansion in your convertible. You arrived at the same time than Anita, her slim latino figure slowly stepping out of her used Ford break. You welcomed her and quickly went down to business once you led her to your room. " Listen Anita, I have something important to ask of you." You could see the concern on her face looked genuine, and accentuated her natural beauty : she looked a lot like a young Eva Mendes, except that she seemed to have little to no make-up on her. If it wasn't for the cultural barrier and maybe the money, you guessed she could have taken Sharon's spot kinda easily as far as looks go.

"What would you say if I told you I could switch bodies? And that I want to switch with you, temporarily at least ?" She looked at you wide-eyed, partly because she tried to see if you were kidding, and partly because she couldn't figure out why you would swap with her if given the chance. You ended up telling her most of the story, including the part with Sharon and yourself swapping and the memory question, and you made her promise she wouldn't tell a soul. When she realized you were dead serious, she smiled and said " Dju know, I have it good here, but I woud really love too see things from an american perspective, see ?" "Yeah, I guess I know where you're coming from...Look, let's swap for a whole day and we'll see where we stand tomorrow night, okay ? I'll meet you here...but as a guest this time."

You could see she still wasn't buying all of it, but you motioned her to stay calm, and then wished you and her to swap bodies. You quickly went blank, the world swirling one last time just after you noticed Anita's body laying on the other edge of the bed. When you came back to your senses...
1242212211221221112212111112221222222111.title: Anita Moreno

choices: ...you go to school for a "fun" day.
1242212211221221112212111112221222222111.content:
Still a little dazed from the swap, you struggled to get up, slowl getting used to the higher center of gravity
you now possessed as the rather slender Anita, when Sharon had a more voluptuous body, even she wasn't
fat by any means.

The first thing you noticed, aside from being in a different body, was she new Sharon marveling over her body,
twirling frantically around the huge mirror that decorated her new room.

You approached her to discover an obvious grin on her face while she greeted you with a hug which was very
un-Sharon like. You retorted "Please, don't mez it up as Sharon, okay ?", discovering that English now was a pain
in the ass for you to speak. You also seem to have inherited her thick mexican accent, which seemed to make the
new Sharon Winterly smile.

"So long as an outsider, and now I'm finally the all-american girl !" She retorted, with the perfect SoCal accent you
had just a couple of minutes ago.

Once the awe of the change has sunk in a little bit, you agreed to exchange the basics needed to act as each other
for the next day, and most importantly, you discovered that the "chain of thoughts" and basic habits were swapped
with the bodies. So for now, you had the thick mexican accent Anita had earlier and her mannerisms too, as you
absent-mindedly tucked your hair the same way you saw her do yesterday...

It was settled : you had to switch back to your original body ASAP if you didn't want to lose yourself permanently...
Full of worries, you took a little time to admire your new body after going back to Anita's home (she had given you
directions to it) and nodded happily while enjoying what you envisioned to be "the end of the ride"

The next morning...
1242212211221221112212111112221222222111.title: ...the new Sharon is already up.

choices: Betty decides to confront the apparent Sharon.
1242212211221221112212111112221222222111.content:
For the first time in the last couple of days, you wake up with a legit and lasting smile on your
face : it was finally the last day you had to spend as someone else, as you finally decided to
swap back with Sharon.

For some reason, maybe out of nostalgia or just for kicks, you decided to spend a fun, carefree
day as Anita Moreno and completely stay out of your "drama circle" for a change. You planned
to spend it with Anita's friends (most of the time, the girl hung out with Elisabeth Narby and Melissa
Shank), swap back with her, and finally confront Sharon and swap back to your original body.

[Meanwhile, in Victoria Wilson's house...]

The "original" Victoria didn't know it, but at the same time, another person was waking up with maybe
an even bigger smile on her face than herself : her original body, occupied by none other than the former
"queen bee" Sharon Winterly. Sharon was feeling more and more at ease with her new body, and her
IQ and memory seemed to have improved some more. She still remembered herself as Sharon, but she
had to concentrate long and hard to remember her past parties or boyfriends. Only "core memories", like
her former BFFs Trisha and Grace, still seemed "easy to access".
At the same time, she had gained what she guessed was most of Victoria Wilson's IQ (her homework
looked easier every time she started a new assignment) and probably also most of her memories, like
Victoria's first day in high school or the day she met Robert, but she was frustrated to note that some "key
stuff" was also missing, like her first kiss or the day she met Betty. Nevertheless, her goal was getting closer
and closer, and she wondered if that meant the power was also coming to her...She would have to try it sometime.

A little later, at school...

The apparent "Anita Moreno" walked casually in the hallway a couple of minutes before what her schedule indicated
as her first class of the day. She had agreed with "Sharon Winterly" not to have any contact with her during the day
(except an "emergency body swap situation", of course). She was happy to see Betty Jinus, who obviously didn't
recognize her, in this first class, and barely listened to the Maths teacher explaining a complicated theorem, as she
was dreaming about having her body back. She also didn't realize that more and more of her memories as Victoria
were slipping away...

In the same classroom...

Betty Jinus was dumbfounded. She didn't believe it at first, but she finally had to. When Victoria came to talk to her
this morning, she believed it was still Sharon Winterly inhabiting her body. But the girl surprisingly told her she finally
had the courage to go and talk to the real Sharon, and that they had swapped back. When Betty didn't buy it, she
answered numerous questions like only the "real Victoria" could. She also bluntly told her afterwards that it seemed she
had lost her power after swapping back, and that she was disappointed but relieved to be "finally back where (she) belonged."
Betty congratulated her about finally stepping up to the bitch, and she couldn't help but notice a (very) slight reaction where
Victoria actually frowned disapprovingly, before quickly agreeing with her.

So Betty was here, wondering whether her real friend was back or if Sharon was playing a trick on her. At the same time, if
this was indeed Sharon, how could she know so much about Victoria ?

Meanwhile, in PE...

The former Anita Moreno was beaming. True, she was already considered pretty as herself, but she had seen how much boys
loved the curves and confidence of Sharon Winterly. And now, she was the one flaunting her newly-acquired "assets" and loving
every minute of it. The boys were litteraly at her feet, and she found it incredibly easy to display Sharon's usual confidence when
dealing with them. She also found that her new body excelled at volleyball, which was logical as Sharon was the captain of the
school team.
At the end of the class, she was a little surprised to see Victoria Wilson coming to class, which apparently was her next. She
had to recognize that the "body swap power" was real last night when a girl claiming to be Victoria offered to swap Sharon
Winterly's body with hers "just to be sure of something".
She wasn't sure of much of the story was real, but she was definitely sure she made a good deal by agreeing to swap, and as far
as she was concerned, the girl could keep her former body for all she cared...No more outsider looks, no more trouble learning
english : everything was easy now, and she had all the money in the world to do whatever she wanted.

She was kinda surprised to be approached by the girl she had been told was "the real Sharon Winterly". She especially had trouble
understanding how a girl like that could be willing to sacrifice everything just to be the cute yet very "common" (or so she considered)
Victoria Wilson.

"Victoria" motioned "Sharon" to follow her in an empty room on the side, and bluntly told her :

"You're Anita, right ?"
Now she REALLY was surprised : judging by the way the girl was looking at her, the story she was told yesterday might actually be
true...
"Sharon ?!" "Wait...She told you everything, didn't she?"
"Yeah, and she actually also told me to stay away from you. I shouldn't..."
"Well, I've seen you look at your newfound body, and if you want to keep it as much as I think you do, you will listen to me till the end..."

"Victoria" wore a sinister grin, and started explaining her plan to "Sharon" and "testing things out"...
1242212211221221112212111112221222222111.title: ...you go to school for a "fun" day.

choices: Shrug it off. That can wait, you must get to class.
Talk to her. That must be important.
1242212211221221112212111112221222222111.content:
"No.This is Sharon Winterly. I've come to retrieve my money, since your swap, or whatever that was, wore off for some reason." You had decided to play it safe and keep up your new Sharon persona. You tried to appear as snobbish and bossy as possible, and you found it surprisingly easy, wondering how much of Sharon's body language you had already acquired. Betty appeared completely dumbfounded, and didn't even try to hide the fact that she was behind the body swap shack. She brought back the wallet containing the money, and quite abruptly ended the conversation by saying. "Now excuse me, but I have an urgent phone call to make. Good night." She shut the door in your face and left you with your new money, body and life.

You finally started to accept this change and looked ahead to see what the future was holding for Sharon Winterly.

[Meanwhile, in Victoria Wilson's house...]

The former Sharon was relieved. When she learned that it was Victoria who had the power and when she changed them back, she thought it was all over : her lifelong dream of becoming the bubbly blonde girl who had seemingly everything she wanted would be over. Surprisingly, Victoria seemed less than happy about being herself, and she somehow ended up being convinced to try the swap on a longer basis. Now Victoria didn't feel at home in her new body yet, but she really felt better than she ever did as Sharon. She was scanning the list of information the former Victoria had given her, and even if she knew most of it, the paper contained some info she couldn't have obtained otherwise : her locker combination and various computer passwords, basic information about her family and detailed info on Betty since the two were hanging together very often...But before she had time to finish reading, her cellphone rang, and she dreaded the confrontation with Betty. The former Victoria must have told her everything by now, and I'm gonna have to deal with an angry girl...

"Victoria ? Are you all right? What happened?" Betty sounded anxious, and even called her by her new name...could it be possible that her friend didn't say anything ? She answered cautiously. "I...I had a problem with my power, and now I'm powerless and back to my own body." She hoped Betty wouldn't be able to detect the lie, and was satisfied when she heard the answer. "Do you want me to come to your place and help you with something? You look tense..." "I'm just a little tired. I'll see you tomorrow morning at school if you don't mind." "No problem ! Sleep well, and don't worry...It was cool while it lasted !"

The new Victoria hung up and flashed an evil smile after she realized that even Vicky's best friend wasn't able to tell the difference between the old and the new Victoria. Tomorrow will be an interesting day indeed...

That's how both girls ended up falling asleep while browsing information about the other one. Information they now HAD to know due to their swap. The next day, each came to school as usual...at least, the usual way their bodies came : Sharon in her brand-new pink BMW convertible, and Victoria in the bus with Betty. The new Victoria found this idle chat quite easy, and at the same time very helpful for her to get into character, which she found increasingly easy which each passing hour. She was also disturbed with memories of a life she didn't live popping up randomly in her head, but since Sharon wanted to distance herself from her former identity, she kept this to herself.

Both Victoria and Betty arrived in the school hall, before Betty made a grunt noise and pointed in the opposite direction. "Here she is. To think you could have been trapped as her...No offence Victoria, but I like you much better as you are. She's all style and no substance...And I hear her grades are getting to the point where even her parents money won't save her."
The new Victoria should have been hurt by those comment, but her former life seemed so far and foreign that she didn't even care. Betty was her friend now, and the Trishas and Graces of the world could go to hell for all she cared. What really surprised her, though, was the way Sharon Winterly had dressed her new body. Usually a pretty but kinda conservative girl (the kind of clothes Victoria was wearing right now), her swap to Sharon seemed to have motivated the girl : she seemed to have kept the fake nails Sharon had, but changed their color to a bright red. She also had opted for a low-cut, cream and black V top that accentuated her now curvy body and a black mini-skirt, and had even more makeup than the former Sharon used to apply...which was already above average.

Not only did she dress the "queen bee" part, but she was talking with the whole cheerleading clique : Trisha and Grace were at her side, and you could see her talking briefly with Elisabeth Narby too, which was more unusual. You found yourself continuing to chat with Betty (who was pressing you with questions about Robert Bennet, your new love interest as Victoria), more curious than concerned with your former body.

A couple of minutes afterwards, the bell rang and you were about to go to class (Betty had already entered) when Sharon put a hand on your shoulder and motioned for you to come and talk to her. What do you do ?
1242212211221221112212111112221222222111.title: "No, this is the real Sharon. I've come...

choices: "I'll swap her with Trisha, and she'll be my new BFF !"
1242212211221221112212111112221222222111.content:
You followed the new Sharon along the corridor and to an empty classroom.
She quickly closed the door after having made you enter.
"Listen Sharon, we need to talk." "I believe YOU are Sharon now...you shouldn't slip
up, even when we are in private."

She sighed a little, and reluctantly agreed. "I suppose you're right...Victoria. Now, I
really needed to talk to you for a few minutes. First of all, you need to know that I..."

You decided to cut her off "You decided to cut ties with Betty in order to live your new
Sharon life to the fullest...I know."

She raised one of her long fake red nails and replied "That's not the whole story...I've
also decided to help out my friend Elisabeth."

Seeing her talking to Elisabeth Narby made sense, but you wondered what she might
mean by "helping her out"

"That's kinda simple. Even though she loves her parents, they're always watching her,
spying her every move, ruining her social life with their ridiculous 9pm curfew....She wants
a way out of it, even temporarily. I've decided to give it to her."

Afraid by her next answer, you had to ask : "Who are you planning to swap her with ?"

She flashed a bright smile before answering...
1242212211221221112212111112221222222111.title: Talk to her. That must be important.

Grace Beaufield - She wants to ask "Sharon" about something...
1242212211221221112212111112221222222111.content:
Since you were now Sharon, you should as well head back home.
You didn't really understand why you had let her in your body...
maybe seeing her fight so much for it made you willing to give her
a chance.

Even if you're willing to try being Sharon Winterly, at least
for a while, you liked your life as Victoria Wilson, so you decide to
watch her closely in order to make sure that she doesn't screw up
what is now your old life.

While driving to your mansion, your phone rings. It's...
1242212211221221112212111112221222222111.title: Head to Sharon's home.

choices: Your alarm : Sharon seems to get up kinda early.
1242212211221221112212111112221222222111.content:
Your phone rings and surprisingly, it reads "Victoria W". You left your - well,
technically her- house a few minutes ago so you don't really see what she'd
have to say, but you decide to take her call anyway.

"- Yes Sharon, what do you want?"

Your answer is met with a long silence, which you quickly understand is due
to the fact that she insisted on being called "Victoria" from now on.

"- Okay, sorry...VICTORIA. What are you calling so soon ?"

You hear a sigh of relief on her side of the phone, followed by her answer :

"- I think there's still something we forgot to discuss earlier. Starting tomorrow,
we are going to school...in a new way, so to speak. What i would like to know is
how do you plan to...interact with others ?"

You didn't really understand where she was going at first, and then it hit you :

"- You mean, who will i speak to ?" You had trouble hiding the anger in your
voice, and the new Victoria sensed it :

"- Don't take it the wrong way. You see, people are used to see Victoria Wilson
hang out with Betty Jinus and some others, like they usually see Sharon Winterly
with Trisha Jones and others.
- And...?
- And even if we'll probably have to "adjust" that a little bit, you can't just suddenly be
best friends with Betty overnight when Sharon despised her, like i can't be Trisha's new
BFF when you...well, you didn't like her very much, right ?"

She was right...even if it was a pain to admit it, you knew it wouldn't be fair to you to "lend"
her your body while "forbiding" her to live your life. Can't have one without the other, you
guessed...And on the other hand, it would be a chance to get to know Sharon's friends, even
if Trisha's body was currently occupied by her mother, you remembered.

"- I guess you have a point, even if i don't like it. What do you suggest ?
- It's pretty simple really. Act like Sharon Winterly would. And you know i'll do a pretty
good job of acting like Victoria Wilson does."

She emphasized the names, in a discreet yet obvious reminder of your altered state. You knew
she had all the data she needed to act as you if she really dedicated herself to it, but you had
witnessed Sharon being such a bitch sometimes that you weren't entirely sure she could pull
this off 24/7. In fact, that was your worst fear : that she'd screw your life beyond repair. And in
order to avoid that, you had no choice but to be cooperative and be close to her as much as
possible, in the beginning at least.

"- I won't be able to act exactly like you, Sha...Victoria. You know that. Unlike you, i haven't
been planning that for years.
- I know, i know...just try to make your changes subtle. People will get suspicious if you do
exactly the contrary of what i would have done, but doing something just slightly different will
do the trick.
- Same for you...i know you...well you don't need my advice, but i'm generally perceived as
nicer than you are..ah...were as Sharon.
- Yeah, i know, but i believe most of it came from my frustration...now that i'm in peace with
who i am, nobody will be able to tell the difference."

This last sentence sent shivers trough your spine, even if she meant well. In a way, you wanted
people not to recognize the difference, but at the same time... you sort of had to be different.

Still unsure of what to do, you asked one last question :

"- One last thing...What about Betty ? She knew about my secret, and last time we spoke, I was
heading to...well...YOUR house to swap back.
- Perfect !
- Perfect ?! What are you talking about ?
- That as far as she knows, we have swapped back, i'm the real Victoria and you're the real Sharon.
I lost my power and i don't know why, but since i didn't know why i got it, it seems right.
- Are you kidding me ?!
- Just hear me out : i'm giving you Trisha and Grace, my two best friends. I'm giving you the head
of the cheerleading squad, the volleyball team, and my money. Plus you probably can have pretty
much any guy you want in the school...i didn't have a steady boyfriend by the way.
- And what's that's supposed to mean ?
- That means that i'm putting all on the line just for a chance to be you : my former beauty, popularity
and wealth are now yours. And all i'm asking you in return is the opportunity to really experience it. And
I cannot do that if Betty Jinus starts hanging around exclusively with Sharon Winterly because she knows
we swapped. Do...you...understand...that...?"

You heard through the phone that she was on the verge of tears while explaining the situation to you, and she
started crying just after finishing her last sentence. And then again, you quickly felt like agreeing with her : it
wouldn't be fair to her to "crush her dream" by working with Betty. You decided to reply quickly :

"- Please stop crying. You're right. You can call Betty and tell her your story. Just be VERY careful : she knows
me better than i know myself, so it's going to be harder for you to maintain appearances around her than it would
be everywhere...including my house. Is that okay to you?
-It's...it's perfect. Thank you, thank you for everything you're doing for me Sharon, i won't forget it ! Is...is it okay if we
have coffee together after school tomorrow to...well, get the hang of things and maybe exhange some additionnal
info ? I'd have said lunch but that's gonna raise questions.
- Yeah, i understand. Coffee at Pete's, 5 PM ?
- All right ! Thanks again Sharon, see you tomorrow !
- No problem Sh...Victoria
-Oh yeah, that raises one last problem : starting tomorrow, you just can't slip up like this. Please, i beg you, just
pay attention !
-Oh...okay, I guess you're right. See you tomorrow...Victoria.
- See ya Sharon !"

Shocked by this exchange, you took the time to process all the things that you agreed on during the phone call :
no more Betty like you used to, and essentially living and acting exactly the same way Sharon did at least during
the beginning, only being allowed to subtle changes...

Feeling weak and defeated, you headed on to what was your home and your room, quickly hugging your mom and
a man you identified as Sharon's father, refusing to eat because of a stomachache, and dozing to sleep.

The next morning, you're woken up by the sound of your phone. It's...
1242212211221221112212111112221222222111.title: Victoria - She forgot to tell you something...

1242212211221221112212111112221222222111.content:
"-Hey Sharon !
-Hey..." You answered back, still half-asleep, and noticed it was 7.30 AM. Since
the original Sharon mentioned that she had her first class at 9 today, you guessed
it was about time to get up anyway...you also tried your best to "stay in character"
as she asked you, and replied to Grace :

"-What did you call ?
-Have you completely forgotten about today, or what ?
-Well...I guess I did..." You quickly replied, not sure about what to say, noting that
apparently Sharon had forgotten to tell you about a commitment she had made... but
then again, she was so exalted that it wouldn't be surprising.

"-Could you...refresh my memory on this ?
- Yeah, we were supposed to meet for...
1242212211221221112212111112221222222111.title: It's Grace Beaufield.

choices: Don't involve yourself with the bet. Sharon deserves a chance.
Ensure that Sharon loses the bet.
Continue with your body swap services.
1242212211221221112212111112221222222111.content:
"I can't do it now, Sharon. Not today." You tell Sharon. Sharon gets on her knees as she begs you. "No, please I'll do anything, anything!" Sharon is almost in tears now. She looks up to you with this sorrow expression on her face.

"I said not today." You tell her. "Look, if we're going to swap permanent I don't want the life you're leading right now and I don't want you to do it with my body."

"I'll do better, I promise." You can hear the excitement in Sharon's voice rising. Her hope has gone up again.

"You have a week to prove yourself. Show me that you can be better than you are now. I'll hold a sleepover for you. At the sleepover I'll let you know if I find you worthy enough to have my body."

"Deal." Sharon says immediately. You thought she might do it, Sharon is so happy about it. "Thank you, I know you have this great gift and I really want to be you."

"We shall see." You answer her mysterious.

As Sharon wants to walk out of the room, she suddenly stands still. "What exactly do I have to do better?"

"I think you know what I mean. I don't want to see you bullying Betty or anyone else."

You see Sharon looking angry for a moment, before she puts on a confident smile. "Oh I know I can do that." And with that she leaves your room.

"And make sure your grades are okay." You also tell her, but you're not sure if she heard you.

You let yourself fall down on the bed. What a day, first you swapped mother and daughter, then you swapped with Sharon and discovered her obsession with you. You frown though. You only have managed to avoid the inevitable. If Sharon was really as desperate as you think she is, she's not letting herself go.

Unless of course you would find some way to provoke her into bullying someone. But that would be wrong, wouldn't it? On the other hand your body is at stake here.
1242212211221221112212111112221222222111.title: Stay as you are.

choices: She wants to take a more thorough look at her body.
She wants to do some fun stuff with you.
She wants to do something else.
1242212211221221112212111112221222222111.content:
"No, that's not me." You shout out loud. Cheating yourself out of a bet, that's not something you would do.

"What is the matter honey?" Your mother asks you as she walks inside your room.

"Nothing, just some stuff happening at school." You mumble.

"Well, if it's anything you want to talk about, you can always tell me." Your mother replies with her usual smile. Without a notice you give your mother a big hug.

"Honey, what's the matter?" She asks you confused as she strokes your back.

"Nothing, just wanted to hug you." You say closing your eyes and trying to remember this warm feeling. It might be one of the last hugs you will ever receive of your mom.

The week passes slowly. When you enter school on Monday nothing seems to have changed, Sharon was still getting the attention and she seemed to behave like normal. There was one exception though, the bullying stopped. No kid was getting bullied buy Sharon Winterly. After you interrogated Betty about Sharon's behavior during gym (you try to catch Sharon on the slightest thing she did to Betty, but nothing out happened) Betty asks about your interest in Sharon's behavior. It's then that you tell her about the bet you made with Sharon. Betty isn't surprised with your decision, she knows you always try to be good to everyone. Betty doesn't seem to mind it though, she sees it as an opportunity to be more popular. It's just that she isn't the one who gets to be swapped.

The rest of the week passed calmly, Sharon keeps her promise and doesn't bully anyone. She even manages to raise a few of her grades. All to please you, of course. On Friday you walk over to Sharon with trembling knees and ask her for a sleepover that night. She nods slightly and then goes back to her business. You text your mom if it's okay if you bring a friend over for a sleepover. There is a sparkle of hope that your mother doesn't want it, but your mother agrees to a sleepover and is very happy about it.

When the school day ends you make your goodbyes to Betty, promising you keep contact. When you get home with the bus Sharon is already waiting for you. She was probably brought by her driver. She has a large bag with her to hold her stuff in. Unlike school she acts much more friendly. Entering your home you introduce your mother to Sharon, who she already met (when you were here). The two of you both go upstairs and the first question Sharon asks you if she passed your bet.

"I haven't seen you bullied anyone and your grades have gone up, you have passed." A faint smile on your face.

"I knew it, so that means I get to be you permanent right?" Sharon asks you with a smug on her face. You nod your head, she is right. "So are you going to switch us now?" Sharon asks you eagerly.

You shake your head. "I want one final dinner with my parents. After that I'll switch us." You promise her. Sharon looks satisfied with your promise. Until dinner time the two of you fill your time with exchanging information. Even though Sharon has gathered a lot about you a few details are a bit off or not right at all.

When your mom tells you it's dinner time, you prepare yourself for your last dinner here. As you go downstairs and into the kitchen, you can see your mom and dad already sitting. Your mom made macaroni and cheese, your favorite dish. It's one thing you will miss. Sharon makes conversation with your mom and dad who will soon become own parents. At first you think she won't get along with them, but soon she makes them laugh with a few of her jokes. She gets along well with your parents and that's the most important thing for you. When dinner is finished you and Sharon are excused from doing the dishes and go upstairs.

Inside your room you tremble a little. "Congratulations Sharon, you passed my final test."

"Test? What for test?" Sharon asks confused.

"Dinner, I wanted to see how you would get along with mom and dad. I don't want my parents end up with someone who wouldn't get along with them. You did great back there."

"Thanks, I knew a bit about them already so it wasn't difficult."

"So, are you ready for it?" You ask Sharon. She eagerly nods her head. You concentrate on swapping with Sharon and suddenly you are standing across your former body. "It worked, I'm me again." Sharon says getting more excited touching her face.

"I'm you again." You mutter noticing your new voice. Your hands pulls your long hair behind your ears, as careful as you can be with your fake fingernails.

"So what do you want to do?" You ask the new Victoria.
1242212211221221112212111112221222222111.title: Don't involve yourself with the bet. Sharon...

choices: "You wouldn't like him for no reason. I'm sure I'll find some qualities I like."
"Relax Sharon, I don't like him like that. I just wanted to help you out."
1242212211221221112212111112221222222111.content:
The new Victoria puts her index finger on her cheek, thinking to herself quietly for a moment. "Actually before we do anything Sharon, I do have an important question to ask you. Just some more information is all."

You uncomfortably shift around, didn't you already answer all relevant information she needed to live out your life? What exactly could she possibly want? "Umm, go ahead." You tell her, as you feel a sense of nervousness well up inside of you.

"Well there is something I did always want to know. Who exactly do you like?"

Stunned by the question, as well as fearful of losing Robert, you tell her a lie. "I don't like anyone." Your voice comes off as frightened, and you know for a fact that Sharon can see through this and knows you're lying.

"Is that so?" She asks. "So you don't like Josh Hampton, Captain of the football team? " You don't reply to her question, instead you cross your arms and turn your head to the side partially out of embarrassment and partially out of stubbornness. "How about Josh Langford then?" You twitch slightly at this. info.brief_description: Someone gains the ability to swap bodies with people as well as a few other powers
info.description:
One of 4 characters gain the power to:

1. Swap bodies with other people.
2. Once a day, cause someone (of the opposite sex of the body they are currently in) to orgasm without physical contact
3. for a time period of 24 hours, they may give anyone the personality of someone else (1 person per day)

Additional notes:
1. If, through a personality change, the person with the power receives an extraordinarily strong willed personality, they are better at controlling their powers and may even become consciously aware of them through a sudden realization. (Not very many people can have this type of personality naturally.
2. Aside from an event like mentioned in note 1, the person can only discover about their powers through the analysis of their effects. also, everyone starts out unaware of their powers.
3. the initial 4 people do not have the type of personality mentioned in 1.

The following rules apply:
1. No killing the main character
2. No personality changes beyond the above mentioned exchange
3. Try to keep good grammar
4. only 1 person has the above mentioned powers

Characters: (please add more as the story progresses)
Robert Bennet: initial main character, has a crush on Victoria but is too shy to ask her out
Victoria Wilson: Has a crush on Robert, but is waiting for him to ask her out
Hank: school bully, likes tormenting Robert
Hillary Turner: School librarian
Maria Bennet: Robert's 17 year old sister
Cliff Huntington: Grace's boyfriend,
Grace Beaufield: Cliff's girlfriend, *Very strong willed*
Betty: Victoria's best friend
Josh Langford: Robert's best friend
Sharon Winterly: head cheerleader and volleyball player
Melissa Shank: beautiful girl who hides her beauty beneath grime and baggy/unappealing clothes
Josh Hampton: Captain of the Football team
Elizabeth Narby: Very Religious, boyfriend is soccer team captain, *Very strong willed*
Mika Lu: Maria's best friend, marathon runner
Marsha Mamoud: Indian Exchange student
Pauline Smith: School receptionist, hyper organized and professional, *Very strong willed*
